docs.text: Herders Coping with Hazards in Kyrgyzstan and Mongolia Trajectory Analysis Code - 'herdersTA' The functions for analyzing trajectory data that have been developed throughout the project were bundled in the R-package herdersTA : https://github.com/henningte/herdersTA Analysis of Movement Patterns of Mongolian Herders - 'herdersmovementpatterns' The functions for deriving indicators on movement patterns based on the preprocessed trajectory data have been bundled in the R-package herdersmovementpatterns : https://github.com/henningte/herdersmovementpatterns Weather Data Analysis Code -'herdersWDA' The functions for analyzing weather data that have been developed throughout the project were bundled in the R-package herdersWDA : https://github.com/henningte/herdersWDA

docs.text: The functions for deriving indicators on movement patterns based on the preprocessed trajectory data have been bundled in the R-package herdersmovementpatterns : https://github.com/henningte/herdersmovementpatterns
docs.title: Analysis of Movement Patterns of Mongolian Herders - 'herdersmovementpatterns'

docs.text: The functions for analyzing weather data that have been developed throughout the project were bundled in the R-package herdersWDA : https://github.com/henningte/herdersWDA
